lead_paragraph: State agencies and Social Security will disclose to the F.B.I. “protected health information” including those who are dangers to themselves or who cannot manage their own affairs.

headline.print_headline: Under Gun Rules, F.B.I. Will Receive Health Data
headline.main: Under Gun Rules, F.B.I. Will Receive Health Data

snippet: State agencies and Social Security will disclose to the F.B.I. “protected health information” including those who are dangers to themselves or who cannot manage their own affairs.
abstract: Pres Obama's gun control plan will allow state agencies and Social Security Administration to provide some protected mental health information to FBI in order to prevent those posing danger to themselves and others from obtaining guns; measure, coming in response to Republican pressure, draws complaints that it unfairly targets those with mental health issues as source of gun violence.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
